definitions: A country in Western Asia located at the eastern end of the Arabian Peninsula, bordering Oman and Saudi Arabia.
A federation of seven emirates: Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Umm Al Quwain, Ras Al Khaimah, and Fujairah.
examples: The UAE is known for its modern architecture.
Many tourists visit the UAE annually.
The economy of the UAE is diverse.
